summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1153, for the improvement of King Street from the west side of First Avenue South to the west side of Third Avenue South produced south; First Avenue South from Jackson Street to the south line of King Street; and Occidental Avenue and Second Avenue South, each from Jackson Street to King Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and regrading, paving and repaving, sewering and resewering and constructing water mains and all necessary appurtenances therein under Ordinance No. 12922 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
